website_summaries.verdict: These comfortable wingtip-design boots will stand out.
pros: A dressy boot for fall and winter
We love that these look stylish while providing protection from cold weather
The rubber tread is durable and provides decent traction
Leather upper comes in two color options
cons: Size runs large, according to many customers

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Fall & Winter boot!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the wrong size but this is a really good looking and quality made boot that can be worn with dress and casual clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great boot period
customer_reviews.text: Great boot period. I love the “wing-tip” look of these boots. Fit was tight in the beginning but as I wore them they felt better. In the box they felt very hard and rigid so I used some snow-seal and worked it into the leather then I used the hairdryer to melt the stuff in even more. Now they are more supple but not soft. They are warm outside and not too hot when inside and traction is terrific. I will edit this if anything changes but I really love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: ButchA

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, but who doesn't? They look good and are comfortable for dress casual. I highly recommend thick socks though because they are not meant for Wisconsin cold.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Crow

customer_reviews.title: The Montacute Boot is a Quality made stylish boot that you will love to own
customer_reviews.text: I really like this boot. Have worn it out twice and got lots of compliments... I paid attention to the other reviews saying that the sizes ran large and I ordered a half size smaller and they fit perfect. This is a quality boot that is very comfortable and stylish. Wish there was a black one in this same style
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Half size too large
customer_reviews.text: 10.5 fits like 11ish(44 is really 45 I believe). Much longer than any other 44 i own. Beautiful boot but have to send back sadly. :(. In the looks department 5 stars, deducting a star for improper sizing and deducting another star for pricing half size smaller $30 more.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Really, Really Cool
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They run a smidge large, but not enough to order down a size, even wearing mid-weight socks. At first, I polished them. Now, I apply boot oil and then a waterproofing spray. The oil really makes them a classic piece, and overall the boots are both worn in wear with anything, and slightly dressy. Clarks always delivers...this comes from a Red Wing, Blundstone, Bed Stu wearing man.
customer_reviews.author: Roi

customer_reviews.title: Like this boot
customer_reviews.text: Like this boot, looks great and appears, after several weeks of wear, to be solidly built. I've generally had good luck with Clarks boots. Do take note, it seems to run large. I'm usually 11 or 11.5, got the 11s and they are definitely on the large side, would've liked to have tried a 10.5 for comparison but never got around to it. If you're on the fence, I'd recommend ordering the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: sdh

customer_reviews.title: Not too dressy, not too casual; just right.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look of these boots. I wanted high-quality boots that weren't "work boots," but weren't $300+ "dress" boots either. These fit the bill perfectly. Their wingtip styling makes them nice enough to wear to the office, but also casual enough to wear with jeans. Like any leather shoe, they take some "breaking in" in order to achieve maximum comfort, but right from the beginning, I was able to wear them all day, and they only get more comfortable as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Camlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes for the money! Excellent quality and fit. However, I took the advice of other reviews and ordered a half size smaller than I normally wear and I am glad I did. I normally wear a 9.5 ordered a 9 in this shoe and it fits perfectly with plenty of toe room. Equal to boots three times th price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can look good at a meeting and not worry about climbing a ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially the color was not what I was expecting; however, after a couple of polishes I attained the color that I wanted. The shoe is well built and fits as expected. It certainly matches my live in the mountains/work in the city lifestyle. I can look good at a meeting and not worry about climbing a hillside.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Baich

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable for long walks
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable for long walks, but the pull loop on the back catches on my pants and prevents them from falling naturally around the boot. So each time I stand requires a bit of adjustment, otherwise a great looking and fitting boot.
customer_reviews.author: TBTX

customer_reviews.title: order your true size
customer_reviews.text: the construction of the shoe is great. I ordered a half size longer than normal thinking it would be required like other brands but now that i've worn them, it seems as if Clarks has the sizing correct and everyone else is wrong. still, even at a half-size too long they are comfortable and wide enough to give security but not a sloppy feeling
customer_reviews.author: Rory Williams

customer_reviews.title: They are super stylish. Great with jeans
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift that ended up being too big. But since we broke up I kept them and sold them. So all is Jim Dandy! They are super stylish. Great with jeans!
customer_reviews.author: BDelicious

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these over a year ago and I wear them almost every day. I'm a photographer so I am on my feet for hours every day in these boots and my feet are never sore. I just finished a few days in New York City and all I wore was these shoes. Love them, highly recommended. Also they look good with jeans and business casual.
customer_reviews.author: N. Branston

customer_reviews.title: dope boots
customer_reviews.text: As you wear these boots they become increasingly grey. That said, they're really comfortable (all day no prob). They aren't super high quality, but should last a few years without too much trouble. One thing is that they are flannel lined and may be a little warm for warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Nevermind

customer_reviews.title: These boots are so cool. I really like them
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cool. I really like them. They go really well with jeans. Also if you want to be a little edgy you can wear them with business casual.
customer_reviews.author: Big Cheeta

customer_reviews.title: The fit was fine, but the coloring of the boots broke in ...
customer_reviews.text: Classy and hip. One can wear these boots with slacks or jeans; go casual or dress up with these versatile boots! The fit was fine, but the coloring of the boots broke in very nicely after three weeks of wear.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: ... at a store several years ago so I was comfortable getting the same size
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Clarks I bought at a store several years ago so I was comfortable getting the same size. Saw this boot at a Mall, needed the aggressive sole for my bucket list job. The store didn't have my size. The net is great but had it not been for the brick and mortar stores I would not have tried Clarks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Other than this they are very comfortable and provide good support
customer_reviews.text: I am in the breaking in period. After about 3 to 4 hours on the first day, the left boot rubbed a score area on my left interior upper ankle bone. Since then I am putting a band aid over this area and hoping that wearing them for shorter periods will soften and stretch the leather in this area. Other than this they are very comfortable and provide good support.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The leather upper around the lower calf needs to be broken in. .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic boots
customer_reviews.text: I always get compliments when wearing these boots; they are beautifully crafted and very comfortable. If you have high arches, you may want to invest in some type of arch support (inserts). I have worn these shoes for a whole day and never had any issues with them, like I said earlier, they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot. Stylish and practical at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Really great pair of boots. Stylish and practical at the same time. I'm on my feet all day and even wear them as a work boot sometimes. Very comfy. Goes with a lot of other items of clothing. You can dress them up or down easily. Best dress boots I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Hieu Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run large.
customer_reviews.text: Too large for the size listed. If you are like me, between sizes most of the time, do yourself a favor and pick the smaller size instead. Now I'm stuck with a pair of boots that are just a little too big but I didn't realize it until after I wore them out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Lampi

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I am a true 11 1/2, these actually fit perfect, and are a little wider than most show. For me, they are perfect. Takes a few times to wear them to breAk them in, but overall, great show, very comfortable. They must be stylish too, my 25 year old nephew bought the same ones. He knows his stuff. Lol
customer_reviews.author: frank j lapham

customer_reviews.title: Good solid winter boot
customer_reviews.text: I have just received these Clark books and found them acceptable in every way. I have a long history of comfortable wear from use of this shoe maker's products and was again not disappointed. Fit was good because I ordered large to accept wool socks. Craftsmanship was a usual excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Nebraska George

customer_reviews.title: Love them -- great style and fit.
customer_reviews.text: After a short break in period they are great. I found them to be most comfortable not lacing them to the top. Receive lots of positive comments as well. Would buy again, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Certainly comfortable, not too hot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work on a car lot. Have kept me form twisting ankles getting out of tall pickups. Certainly comfortable, not too hot, definitely stylish and thus far appear to be well made (after over a month of daily wear.) My past profession was surveying in mountainous regions - My boots were about $500 each, so I've an idea of relative value.
customer_reviews.author: Griz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable pair of boots out of the box I've ever worn and they look beautiful will definitely buy again I just wish black would come back in stock so I could get a pair for work
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Like clouds
customer_reviews.text: Clark’s are the best and these are no exception. They are lined and I didn’t see that coming but it’s kind of nice. I have these in both brown and black. Bought the black ones a year ago and the just bought these. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SuperNova

customer_reviews.title: Great value boot
customer_reviews.text: Great value boot. As good as boots that cost twice as much. I get lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard I Nemling

customer_reviews.title: First looks, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is pretty difficult get right since there are so many variables to take into account. As a disclaimer, these are my initial impressions from only trying them on as to see what the sizing was like. They haven't been worn yet outside or for any length of time. Generally, the sizing was a little smaller than I expected. I'll qualify that by saying that they're neither too large, nor too small. I would estimate that the 10.5M is a 43-44 comparing to a pair of shoes that are a 44. Based on a few of the other reviews, I was expecting to receive a slightly larger 44-45. That said, the sizing is fairly accurate in my estimation.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf James MacGrady

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I've owned. They arrived a bit scuffed up, but those disappeared when I put some conditioning oil on them. People have already started commenting on them, wondering where they can get theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Moses

customer_reviews.title: Clark's continues to make some of the best shoes available
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that I didn't realize they were fully insulated. Otherwise, Clark's continues to make some of the best shoes available.
customer_reviews.author: Brent T Baker

customer_reviews.title: Okee doke
customer_reviews.text: They did not look as nice on as they do on the pictures but they are decent boots!
customer_reviews.author: JD Norman

customer_reviews.title: These Boots are made for walking,... hiking, ...dress occasions, etc
customer_reviews.text: I just received these boots but they feel great and are easy to put on even without a side zipper. I think I'm going to enjoy wearing them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: F. Tim Wright

customer_reviews.title: Says they are very comfortable! Ordered 1/2 size smaller as recommended by other ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves them. Says they are very comfortable! Ordered 1/2 size smaller as recommended by other reviewers. They are very sharp looking and can go casual or dressy. They fit nicely, look great, and smell good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Counts

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Clarks
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, comfortable, looks good. Treated with mink oil as soon as I received them to protect the leather from snow/slush.Great tread for winter, fuzzy lining for warmth. Look good enough to wear all day in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Habanero

customer_reviews.title: Clunky
customer_reviews.text: A little clunky to be dressy, but in winter it is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Parker

customer_reviews.title: A Good Look
customer_reviews.text: The pictures don't really do them justice. They omitted the amazing looking lining that highlight a quality crafted boot. They are deceptively comfortable too. I hope they release them in black. The charcoal is still nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot. Nice fit and finish, but not on a par with the Wolverines, Alden, etc. But a great value for the money. Runs a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sterner

customer_reviews.title: Great mens dressier-casual boot
customer_reviews.text: Great mens dressier-casual boot. Good fit and great looking however not so great arch support. added inserts and love wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: CabinInTheWoods

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. Amazon asks about arch support in the review and it may be good for most people however I have an unusually high arch and no shoes have good support for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cuff had some more padding. Other than that everything about this shoe is awesom
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & stylish = chic
customer_reviews.text: This boot has easily became one of my favorites. I simply love it. It's extremely adaptable to my choice of dress- either casual or dressy.
customer_reviews.author: Dex Wood

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY FEET!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these shoes. Great shoes,great fit. They fit as though I was there and tried them on in person. Beautiful tan colour.
customer_reviews.author: cuthbert gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe BUT..
customer_reviews.text: had to return the shoe for a 1/2 size smaller, no big deal, however they replacement shoe had scuffs on the heals and toes, and the sole showed light wear. This was more than just trying on and returning. I will keep them as thy fix well and I like the shoe but feel a discount is in order..
customer_reviews.author: Future Pearl Company

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a dream. Feels amazing on the inside. A beautiful boot shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fiancé and he loves them. He gets compliments every time he wears them. They’re great quality
customer_reviews.author: Marah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Way better than other boots I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Way better than other boots I purchased. On par with military jungle bout in terms of build and toughness. But dressy enough to go to work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, size 10 is a size 10
customer_reviews.text: They have a odd finish...casual style as you wear them, the leather creases and lightens to a grey. Great for casual,,, but not what I wanted. I used black shoe dye and black polish, now they are uniformly black and suitable for business.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow, that's what I'm talking bout! These are awesome and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Inge Repair Pro RVA

customer_reviews.title: great looking and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: great looking and very comfortable. lining keeps feet a bit warmer. they are not snow boots so don't expect them to be.
customer_reviews.author: rick flynn

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear E - EE depending on cut of shoe or sneaker. I found that these Clarks are full cut and I was pleasantly surprise that these mediums fit well.
customer_reviews.author: BklynBob

customer_reviews.title: Love my Clarks
customer_reviews.text: I already have two pair of Clark Montacute Wingtip shoes in Black and Drk. Tan. They look great and feel great; well put together and durable. I recommend purchasing more than one pair for long lasting wear. I wear them with my suits since I stand all day. I most certainly recommend this boot and the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Troy N Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful purchase and I am absolutely happy and love my boots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The leather turned very gray in short period of time ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather turned very gray in short period of time. The shoes is also more narrow than expected. The shoe it self has held up well without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joab648

customer_reviews.title: One of my Favorites
customer_reviews.text: Would buy these again. Needed a couple days to break in. Great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one I gave as gift to my younger son, he loves the style specially very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jack or Yixiao Qi

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband. He really likes them and they fit well. Nice looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: These boots did not disappoint. The color is charcoal as described
customer_reviews.text: Clarks is my go to brand for fit and comfort. These boots did not disappoint. The color is charcoal as described, but the photo looks more like high gloss black. There is a weathered look, lighter around the creases, etc. but it is not distressed leather. I am very happy with the look.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe poor sizing table
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fantastic. The quality of the materials are great but just too large for the numbers they claim they are sized for. I tried a half size smaller but even that was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: These boots are great! Go well with dress pants or jeans
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! Go well with dress pants or jeans. I wear a size 10 and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: DWynn

customer_reviews.title: Great casual boots
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots. Ordered size 10 and had enough room for inserts. I've got narrow feet with high arches. Boots fit snug and are able to cinch tight. I normally wear 10s in Clarks so these are slightly larger than other Clarks I own. Finish is superb. No issues in rain like other reviews state. Typical squeek when wet on smooth floors. Haven't seen any stitching or sole separation like some reviews point out. I own the low cut versions of these in all black. I like these better. Got the brown versions this time. 4 wears to the office and these are looking better as they break in.
customer_reviews.author: PDXborn

customer_reviews.title: New Boots
customer_reviews.text: This boot is different from what I normally wear. They look ok but felt a little snug across the tol of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  Cogburn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and extremely comfortable. I'm amazed at the quality for such a low price. I'll be buying Clarks for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great however they are defective, shoelace was broken
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rhames

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, nice style.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, more comfortable than I expected. The toe box has more room than most of my other boots (different brands). A good value. I just would like the leather to have a little more shine.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Plain and Simple-AWESOME FIT and QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and fit. I would buy this item again if I did not not another pair to wear out first..
customer_reviews.author: Hector Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favourite shoe. Fits as expected for the size. I normally wear a US8 and I bought a US8. The warm lining inside makes it a little more comfortable to wear, even in warm weather/places (Singapore). Goes very well with Jeans and looks very classy.
customer_reviews.author: nikita

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit great, but I did try them on at a local store, so I knew what size to get. It is right in my normal size range, on the larger side. I also saved $10 from the local stores price, even though they were having a big sale.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: This product is very excellent; I truly appreciate it
customer_reviews.text: This product is very excellent; I truly appreciate it, and it fits well and arrived as I was told by the seller. Great job fellow!!! I will recommend this seller to anyone wishing to get this product. By the way I intends to get another pair soon sir.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin K. Bombo

customer_reviews.title: Form and Fashion
customer_reviews.text: These go with jeans or slacks, and you won't miss a beat
customer_reviews.author: Abstract.313

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! They fit great & look awesome! I am a tad jealous now, I want a pair too!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 and I finally ended up with a 10 after trying the 11 and a 10.5. So needless to say they run a full size large. Very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great boots the store had them for 150$ and everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots the store had them for 150$ and everything else was on sale so I knew o could find them with the sale price or cheaper on Amazon! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great autumn wingtips brogue in beautiful dark tan from Clarks. Very comfortable and stylish. Sold out everywhere x-cept amazon
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable and stylish Clarks dark tan brogues. Fit and finish are high quality as expected from Clarks. Sold out everywhere except on amazon.com. Bought two pairs and the price is very reasonable comparing to Allen Edmonds.
customer_reviews.author: thomas nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love the style but too big
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. Love the style but too big. Will be exchanging and get a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean Duran

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous deal
customer_reviews.text: Great footwear at a great price delivered on time as promised
customer_reviews.author: robert j

customer_reviews.title: Look good on rainy days
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Get them to look good on rainy days and they are perfect! They hold a shine and are easy to clean up. HIGHLY recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, Great Style!
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with a pair of Clark's
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, I wear it to work and also with my jeans
customer_reviews.author: Cee Bee

customer_reviews.title: This is by for the worst. It is the most un comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited to get these. I have bought 10 pairs of Clarks. This is by for the worst. It is the most un comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect boots for walking around the French Quarter all day.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L.

customer_reviews.title: ... had to replace the Insoles because they were not comfortable walking much distance but good with the new insoles
customer_reviews.text: Won't keep a shine and had to replace the Insoles because they were not comfortable walking much distance but good with the new insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great look, great shoes. I highly recommend theses boots.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shows, you can either wear them casually or formally.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Jager

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but runs big!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly comfortable and stylish boot. However, I normally where a 10.5 or 11 and I had to get a 10 for it to fit right! Now it's one of the best boots I've had in years!
customer_reviews.author: Gene A. Felice II

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and these seem to fit extra extra wide.... Almost sloppy. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. Shipping was fast. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: MandyK

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.  Fit great.  Breaks in fast.  Highly recommended.  I'm buying a second pair.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I have a bone spur and my feet are difficult to fit. These fit great and since I've been wearing them every day, they have broken in quickly. I am considering a second pair so that can alternate shoes every other do to dry them out. Cons: there is a small tab in the tongue of the boot that the laces pass through. This makes them difficult to lace up and unlace. I pulled the laces out of it and plan to cut the tab off completely once I find a razor blade.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Cool Boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits to size. Slightly wide, with a little heavier sock it works. Extremely comfortable from the first wear. Way Cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Heir

customer_reviews.title: Start coming off after 15 mins of wearing
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and feel good. I really like them, although they came about 4 days later than expected. That's ok. However, after about 15 mins of walking with them, the left one was starting to come off. Now I have to deal with the frustrating process of exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Y Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with clarks and they did not disappoint. I will definitely be doing business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex  Colon

customer_reviews.title: ... to work with a suit or slacks these are great. Good fit for wider foot
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a boot that you can wear to work with a suit or slacks these are great. Good fit for wider foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Burrows

customer_reviews.title: great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these boots for my brother. He said they fit great and a great price. Way..cheaper than retail stores. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em
customer_reviews.text: Good boot, good material and construction. Very sturdy, have some weight to them. Nice laces.
customer_reviews.author: FancyFox04

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, nicely crafted...but slightly wimpy leather.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be nicely made boots. The comfort is there from the start. I would say that the toebox is rather wide and overall the sizing is a bit big. The leather is soft and a bit thin...for instance I knelt down so that my toes were facing down and I dented the toe on the boot. I had to take them off to push the toe back out. Not a big deal but just shows how soft the leather is. I am happy with them at the price and they look just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Buehner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loves his shoes. They fit as expected and came in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Aundreana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot with style. Classic Clark comfort but fashionable which you don't associate normally with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Foofur

customer_reviews.title: And I love my new black boots
customer_reviews.text: I already owned the Browns ones. And I love my new black boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Melendez

product_meta.title: Clarks Men's Montacute Lord Boot
product_meta.description: Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
feature_bullets: Rugged yet flexible rubber lug sole
Perfect to dress up or down
